basics.name: Shane Smith
basics.label: Distance Learning Support Technician
basics.summary: I am a Distance Learning Support Technician who loves working with technology. Connecting learner and teacher no matter the distance.

work.summary: Head of Distance Learning Technologies and Integrations
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee the colleges LMS (Learning Management System)
Drive, design, build, and support distance learning technologies for Gateway Technical College
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.summary: Coordinated a group with the collection and disposal of technologies no longer being needed in the community.
highlights: Learned best practices for backing up and restoring a users data
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
